Title: Lay of the Land[TEMP]
Description:
Grah!!

For every one of these muck-flingers we kill, another two spring from the woods to take its place. I wouldn't share this with the others, but it's clear that we won't last long here, $n.

I must stay and defend what remains of our belongings. You scout out the region and seek a solution to our primate problem.

Go now. Our hope goes with you...
